title: How to keep motivating yourself to finish a story you’re writing - Quora

response.answer_text: What was it that made you want to write in the first place? What was it that you loved or enjoyed about it? Chances are if you’re finding it boring thatbwhat you’re writing is boring and your audience will find it that too. Find the joy and follow it. Other recommendations are setting up a routine and sticking to it just like when you’re getting into exercise. The body likes routine.

It is difficult sometime to keep going. If I hit a snag I go, back to see if the story is story is developing. Remember the thread must run from the first page to the last. Is it exciting to you? Would you read it if some else wrote it? Are people in the story real to you? Let them breath. If you are like me let them tell you their story. Hope this helps.
